segments.text: Please come in and sit down . I'm happy to finally meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Same here . I've been looking forward to this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I â€™ m sorry I kept you waiting so long . I'm running a little late today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . That happens to all of us , it goes badly with the traffic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Can I offer you some refreshment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not , thank you . A little tea would be nice .
segments.speaker: S2
